programme.title: Clinton’s draft dodge
programme.short_synopsis: Did Bill Clinton use family and political influence to avoid being drafted during Vietnam?
programme.medium_synopsis: Bill Clinton's draft dodging during the Vietnam War is remembered by Alistair Cooke upon hearing that America's trade embargo on Vietnam is soon to be lifted.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Clinton’s draft dodge

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
